title: MOD无法加载
author: w3038856094
txt_content:
[Fatal Error] :89:5: 元素类型 "log4j_Message" 必须由匹配的结束标记 "</log4j_Message>" 终止。
[16:55:29] [log4j-handler/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.7.8.42
  Time: 2017-10-02 16:55:29
  Thread: Thread[log4j-handler,6,main]


  Content: 
    java.lang.Error: org.xml.sax.SAXParseException; lineNumber: 89; columnNumber: 5; 元素类型 "log4j_Message" 必须由匹配的结束标记 "</log4j_Message>" 终止。
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.Log4jHandler.run(Log4jHandler.java:81)
Caused by: org.xml.sax.SAXParseException; lineNumber: 89; columnNumber: 5; 元素类型 "log4j_Message" 必须由匹配的结束标记 "</log4j_Message>" 终止。
    at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.AbstractSAXParser.parse(Unknown Source)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.Log4jHandler.run(Log4jHandler.java:77)

  Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64), 6.1
  Java Version: 1.8.0_131, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation


[16:55:29] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.7.8.42
  Time: 2017-10-02 16:55:29
  Thread: Thread[ProcessMonitor,6,main]


  Content: 
    java.util.concurrent.RejectedExecutionException: Task java.util.concurrent.FutureTask@7f7fc8f1 rejected from java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor@71b8296e[Terminated, pool size = 0, active threads = 0, queued tasks = 0, completed tasks = 99]
    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$AbortPolicy.rejectedExecution(Unknown Source)
    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.reject(Unknown Source)
    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.execute(Unknown Source)
    at java.util.concurrent.AbstractExecutorService.submit(Unknown Source)
    at java.util.concurrent.Executors$DelegatedExecutorService.submit(Unknown Source)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.Log4jHandler.newLogLine(Log4jHandler.java:115)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.ui.LaunchingUIDaemon$PrintlnProcessor.accept(LaunchingUIDaemon.java:183)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.ui.LaunchingUIDaemon$PrintlnProcessor.accept(LaunchingUIDaemon.java:166)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.api.event.EventHandler.fire(EventHandler.java:59)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.sys.ProcessThread.println(ProcessThread.java:97)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.sys.ProcessThread.run(ProcessThread.java:80)




-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64), 6.1
  Java Version: 1.8.0_131, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation


十月 02, 2017 4:55:36 下午 net.java.games.input.DefaultControllerEnvironment getControllers
信息: Loading: net.java.games.input.DirectAndRawInputEnvironmentPlugin






我自己制作的客户端的日志告诉我这个，虽然游戏不崩溃，但是进游戏，一个MOD都没有加载出来，用的是HMCL启动器2.7.8.42版本，然后用的游戏版本是1.10.2-LiteLoadeer，是在官网下载的。求解决= =

replies.author: 安梦梦
replies.txt_content:
根据你的描述，推测问题是由Forge版本低于某个mod所要求的最低版本引起的。
建议更新一下Forge API
